metadata.dc:title: Crioglobulinemia mixta esencial-hepatitis C positiva, anemia hemolítica autoinmune y púrpura trombocitopénica inmune.
[Hepatitis-C-positive mixed essential cryoglobulinemia, autoimmune hemolytic anemia, and immune thrombocytopenic purpura].
